description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget representing a notes list screen. It manages loading, displaying, creating, editing, and deleting notes using a repository pattern, and integrates with navigation and UI elements.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that displays a list of notes and provides functionality to add, edit, and delete notes.

classes.name: _NotesListScreenState
classes.description: State class for NotesListScreen managing the list data, loading state, and user interactions.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and loads notes on widget creation.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches all notes from the repository and updates the UI.

methods.name: _createNew
methods.description: Creates a new note by navigating to the editor screen and refreshes the list upon saving.

methods.name: _openEditor
methods.description: Opens an existing note in the editor screen for editing and refreshes the list after changes.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID and refreshes the list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, showing loading indicator, empty state, or notes list with refresh capability.
